title: 98. Kidz Bop 33 - KIDZ BOP Kids
text: I stg if you ruin any more of the top songs I'm going to sue Biography Formed: 2001 in New York, NY Genre: Children's Music Years Active: '00s, '10s Razor & Tie's Kidz Bop series of singalong collections debuted in 2001. Known for their "kid-friendly" versions of hit singles that are re-recorded by session musicians and singers and the Kidz Bop Kids, a chorus of child singers, the compilations became popular with families who wanted cleaned-up versions of contemporary songs: beginning with 2005's Kidz Bop, Vol. 7, they routinely debuted within the Billboard Top Ten, and collectively have sold close to ten million copies total. Along with the...   KIDZ BOP Kids 1.
